}} 'Field Island' is a Baffin Island offshore island located in the
Canadian Arctic Archipelago in the territory of Nunavut. The island lies in
Frobisher Bay, west of Waddell Bay, and southeast of Opera Glass Cape on the
Hall Peninsula. Islands in the immediate vicinity include: Bruce Island to the
northwest, Fletcher Island to the west, and Chase Island to the south.
